name: GMX Webmail Dark / night mode
description:
Dark gray theme for the GMX Webmail interface.
Compatible with the default color themes.
However, the link color for each theme is too dark: I've replaced it with an orange color.
Feel free to modify it from here.

This style is used on a french GMX account (navigator-bs.gmx.fr/calendar.gmx.fr/cloud.gmx.net).

But...it should work natively with other languages: I've defined regex for url containing "-bs.gmx.", "calendar.gmx." & "cloud.gmx.".

***Apparently not working on the gmx.net domain (german/austrian/swiss websites)***

user.name: massiliattak
user.about: I am a french Star Citizen. If you've ever heard about this game and wish to earn 5000 credits, then follow this link (it's free!).

additional_info:
20161116-2302 - various fixes in the organizer (date colors)
20161116-2120 - changed color for month/year on the sidebar of the organizer (now same as the link color for the reason that it's a themed link).
20161114-1850 - fixed link color in emails (default one restored).
20161114-1000 - various fixes for links/calendar/hovering/menus
20161113 - Initial release
